attributes.action: Keep NHS Brain Injury rehabilitation facilities in Aylesbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rayners Hedge is a 10 bed brain injury rehabilation center in Croft Road Aylesbury, the center faces closure by the local NHS trust, with the service moved 15 miles away to Amersham, this can only have a detremental effect on patients and their families, the center helps those who have suffered strokes through to head injuries from road traffic accidents.
